page.title: 12 A Country Vet
page.content: Mrs Jenny James runs her practice from her home at Manor Farm Padbury.She visits about 60 farms in the area,treating live stock, but does not work with horses. Surgery appointments may be booked, mon - fri 8.30 - 10.30am & 4.00 - 7.00 pm.Times may vary, especially at lambing time.Mrs Masterton also works in the pratice. Cats,dogs and small pets such as hamsters, tortoises and guinea pigs form the main part of surgery work but goats, ferrets, stick insects and snakes are also her patients. Work can be physically demanding, especilly calving cows.It is difficult to fit holidays into the busy schedule. Luckily there are few night calls. Mrs James also runs a cattery at manor farm.
